item.title: Things3 Weekly Review mode shortcut(s)
item.description: Requirements Be a user of Things3, and heavy on Getting Things Done Shortcuts app The shortcuts _Weekly Review and Update weekly review hash_ Drafts or Bear app (either could be used, the shortcut linked below uses Drafts) Initial setup (around 10-30 minutes depending on the amount of projects you have) Create a note in Drafts (you can put it in the note archive) with some text, does’t matter what you write.
